About this course:

This course teaches advanced English idioms and expressions on a variety of different topics to advanced learned of English. It covers 5 different topics which are :

  • Movies
  • Restaurants
  • Globalization
  • Giving Advice
  • News and Media

There is also a bonus section which is compromised of a number of expressions and vocabulary which are found in everyday spoken English. This section contains some golden nuggets which definitely shouldn't be missed.

The course is presented in easy to understand terminology and allows students to take their knowledge of English idioms and expressions to a higher degree of fluency and accuracy.

The course is presented in a number of videos to cover each of the sections mentioned above. Apart from the videos, there is also a quiz in each section to ensure comprehension of the idioms and expressions that are covered. The students are also provided with a task that they are encouraged to do at the end of each section. This task can be done by modelling what the instructor has shown in the appropriate video in the section.

To watch the course videos, you will need roughly around two hours excluding quizzes. However, students are encouraged to take an active role throughout the course, by taking down notes and participating in the tasks given amongst other activities.

If you believe that you are ready to take your English speaking fluency to the next level, then this is the course for you. The idioms and expressions covered in this course will ensure that you are able to communicate better, more fluently and with a higher degree of success with others in your daily life.
title: How To Use Expressions That Native English Use Daily
